resources.string: Activate all features and modes, even future version additions
Take great-looking high-dynamic range images and videos
Shoot great panoramas with help of augmented-reality
Remove unwanted objects, combine movement into single photo, select best faces on your photo
Use premium features FREE for 3 months - subscribe now!

Version 3.25

 New:
 - HDR video (for Android 4.3 and higher)
 - pause for video
 - level tool
 - sweep panorama

 Improved:
 - panorama capture and processing
 - DRO, HDR, Night processing
 - multishots combined in one mode
 - faster processing

 Bug fixes:
 - video fixed
 - stability fixes
